mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_PROJECT_INFO(USER_ID, PROJECT_SEQ, PROJECT_NM, PROJECT_START_DATE, PROJECT_END_DATE, PROJECT_ROLE, PROJECT_CLIENT, ASSIGNED_TASK_LAR, ASSIGNED_TASK_MID, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE, CREATOR, MODIFIER) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{project_seq}, #{project_nm}, #{project_start_date}, #{project_end_date}, #{project_role}, #{project_client}, #{assigned_task_lar}, #{assigned_task_mid}, now(), now(), #{user_id}, #{user_id}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE PROJECT_NM = #{project_nm}, PROJECT_START_DATE = #{project_start_date}, PROJECT_END_DATE = #{project_end_date}, PROJECT_ROLE = #{project_role}, PROJECT_CLIENT = #{project_client}, ASSIGNED_TASK_LAR = #{assigned_task_lar}, ASSIGNED_TASK_MID = #{assigned_task_mid}, MODIFIED_DATE = now(), MODIFIER = #{user_id}

INSERT INTO TB_PROJECT_INFO_HIST(USER_ID, PROJECT_SEQ, HIST_SEQ, PROJECT_NM, PROJECT_START_DATE, PROJECT_END_DATE, PROJECT_ROLE, PROJECT_CLIENT, ASSIGNED_TASK_LAR, ASSIGNED_TASK_MID, CREATED_DATE, CREATOR) SELECT user_id, project_seq, #{hist_seq}, project_nm, project_start_date, project_end_date, project_role, project_client, assigned_task_lar, assigned_task_mid, now(), #{user_id} FROM TB_PROJECT_INFO WHERE project_seq = #{project_seq} AND user_id = #{user_id} AND use_yn = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT PJ.PROJECT_SEQ, PJ.PROJECT_NM, SK.SKILL_ID, SK.SKILL_NM, SK.USE_YN FROM TB_PROJECT_INFO PJ LEFT JOIN TB_USER_SKILL_INFO SK ON PJ.USER_ID = SK.USER_ID AND PJ.PROJECT_SEQ = SK.PROJECT_SEQ AND SK.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE PJ.USER_ID = #{user_id} AND PJ.PROJECT_SEQ = #{project_seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_USER_SKILL_INFO(USER_ID, PROJECT_SEQ, SKILL_ID, SKILL_NM, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE, CREATOR, MODIFIER) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{project_seq}, #{skill_id}, #{skill_nm}, now(), now(), #{user_id}, #{user_id})
